name: Harmon:i:c
description:
SEIZURE WARNING

Thank you for your interest in the latest Self-Powered Multi-Spacial Quantum Resonance Visualizing Chamber (SPMSQRVC)

Follow the development at Twitter and Tumblr and come chat with us in the Discord.

Read the following instructions carefully, incorrect operation of the SPMSQRVC might result in a slow and painful shut off.

Keyboard controls
Enter/Space: Interact
Arrow keys/WASD: Move
Z: Rewind
R: Reset level
Tab/M: Map
ESC: Quit
Alt+Enter: Fullscreen
H: Show/Hide Controls

Joystick controls
A: Interact
D-Pad: Move
B: Rewind
Select: Reset level
X/LB/Start: Map
Y: Exit
RB: Show/Hide Controls

Save location
Windows:
%APPDATA%\Godot\app_userdata\Harmon-i-c\\

Linux and Mac:
$HOME/.godot/app_userdata/Harmon-i-c//

WARNING:

THIS PRODUCT IS IN EARLY DEVELOPMENT

REPORT ANY MALFUNCTIONS

DO NOT ATTEMPT TO DISASSEMBLE IT
